jx.jx_en_mean: have done something considered especially praiseworthy or heroic

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French deservir, from Latin deservire 'serve well or zealously'

encyclopedia.content: 释义 vt.应受（报答）；值得（受赏） vi.应该得到英英解释 1. be worthy or deserving 同义词：merit语法 1.deserve+n. 应受。.. deserve a reward 应受奖励 deserve a punishment 应受惩罚 2.deserve doing 值得被做 He deserves punishing. 他罪有应得 3.deserve to do 值得做。.. Your suggestion deserves to be considered. 你的建议值得被考虑 4.deserve ill/well of 有罪于/有功于 注意：deserve doing等于deserve to be d

entry.def: If you say that a person or thing deserves something, you mean that they should have it or receive it because of their actions or qualities.

example.ex: Government officials clearly deserve some of the blame as well...
example.tran: 政府官员显然也应当承担部分责任。

example.ex: They know the sport inside out, and we treat them with the respect they deserve...
example.tran: 他们对这项体育运动了如指掌，我们也给予了他们应有的尊重。

entry.def: If you say that someone got what they deserved, you mean that they deserved the bad thing that happened to them, and you have no sympathy for them.

example.ex: One of them said the two dead joy riders got what they deserved.
example.tran: 他们中的一个人说这两名开偷来的车去兜风的人死得活该。

sentences.sentence: "You deserve a promotion after all the hard work you have done"

auth_sentence.content: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.
auth_sentence.res_content: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That alone will determine if I deserve a medal.

auth_sentence.content: What did the people ever do to deserve this?
auth_sentence.res_content: What did the people ever do to deserve this?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What did the people ever do to deserve this?

auth_sentence.content: Patients and their families deserve better, she says.
auth_sentence.res_content: Patients and their families deserve better, she says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Patients and their families deserve better, she says.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

kd.ZH: 主动表示被动意义，等于接to do的被动语态

Sentence.sentence: Employees who receive a very favorable evaluation may deserve some type of recognition or even a promotion.
Tomorrow we will transcend these as well, and the dreamers will deserve a lot of the credit
The link between goal-setting and harmful behavior deserves further study.

means.word_mean: 应受, 应得, 值得

sentences.en: He deserves a reward for his efforts.
sentences.cn: 他积极努力, 值得奖赏。

sentences.en: He didn't really deserve (that) she should be so kind to him.
sentences.cn: 他确实不值得她对他那么好。

means.word_mean: 应受报答，应得报酬，应受赏(或罚)，值得奖赏；应得赔偿，应受惩罚

sentences.en: He has been recognized as he deserves.

jushi.english: He deserves a reward for his efforts.
You've been working all morning—you deserve a rest.
jushi.chinese: 你已做了一个上午——该休息一下了。
